abstract: Mike Hopkins will succeed Jim Boeheim as head basketball coach at Syracuse University after 2017-18 season.
lead_paragraph: Mike Hopkins was formally given the title of head coach designate to succeed Boeheim at Syracuse after the 2017-18 season.

headline.main: Jim Boeheim’s Successor at Syracuse Chosen
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | College Basketball; Boeheim’s Successor Is Chosen

snippet: Mike Hopkins was formally given the title of head coach designate to succeed Boeheim at Syracuse after the 2017-18 season.
